member.name: CRYPT_PROVIDER_REGDEFUSAGE
member.summary: The CRYPT_PROVIDER_REGDEFUSAGE structure is used by the function to register callback information about a provider's default usage.

member.name: CRYPT_PROVIDER_REGDEFUSAGE.cbStruct
member.summary: Size, in bytes, of this structure.

member.name: CRYPT_PROVIDER_REGDEFUSAGE.pgActionID
member.summary: GUID that specifies the provider's default action.

member.name: CRYPT_PROVIDER_REGDEFUSAGE.pwszDllName
member.summary: Pointer to the name of the provider DLL.

member.name: CRYPT_PROVIDER_REGDEFUSAGE.pwszLoadCallbackDataFunctionName
member.summary: Pointer to the name of the function that loads the callback data to be returned when the function is called with the dwAction parameter set to DWACTION_ALLOCANDFILL. This information also exists in the structure.

member.name: CRYPT_PROVIDER_REGDEFUSAGE.pwszFreeCallbackDataFunctionName
member.summary: Pointer to the name of the function that frees allocated memory when the function is called with the dwAction parameter set to DWACTION_FREE. This information also exists in the structure.
